finishTradeScreen.title: Success!
finishTradeScreen.description:
Your order was created. 
 Once your transaction will get required confirmations it will be fulfilled accordingly.  
 You can monitor your order status in the orders history.

HOME_SCREEN_BUY_BTN_TIP.description: Here you can buy crypto with card - your Captain Obvious :)

HOME_SCREEN_EXCHANGE_BTN_TIP.description: Now you don’t need to use exchanges - change crypto to crypto with us in 2 clicks!

HOME_SCREEN_ADD_CRYPTO_BTN_TIP.description: Add important assets and start earning - let’s go!

HOME_SCREEN_CRYPTO_BTN_TIP.description: This is your unique bitcoin wallet - start sending and accepting bitcoins!

ACCOUNT_SCREEN_ADDRESS_TIP.description: This is your %{currencyName} address - analog of card number for advanced users!

ACCOUNT_SCREEN_TRANSACTION_TIP.description: Here you can find all the info about your transactions and orders - let’s go!

confirmScreen.title: Confirm
confirmScreen.confirmScreenBuy: This payment method currently unavailable. Please, try another one.
confirmScreen.confirmScreenSell: This payment method currently unavailable. Please, try another one.
confirmScreen.bottomInformation: Please, pay attention, exchange rate is not fixed and might be changed following the market.

walletList.title: Wallet list
walletList.useLegacy: Use legacy address as main for change

backupModal.title: Mnemonic phrase not saved!
backupModal.description:
The mnemonic phrase (seed phrase) is the only key to your assets! In case of failure of the phone or other similar situations, it will be impossible to restore access to your assets without this phrase! We recommend that you save the phrase in a safe place right now! 
 
 If you are asked for a seed phrase, then you are dealing with scammers! 
 Do not tell the seed phrase under any circumstances!

hdEnableModal.title: Switch wallet to HD mode?
hdEnableModal.description: HD mode implies rotation of addresses for each transaction. The switching operation is irreversible.

AddCustomToken.description: Ethereum (ETH) and Tron (TRX) token/asset addresses are supported

cashback.mainDescription: Invite five friends and start earning 10% cashback from the commission of your exchanges! Trustee returns up to 30% commission to its users!
cashback.setParentToken: Link in to your friend structure
cashback.performWithdraw: To perform withdraw, please, write to telegram to nickname @TrusteeWallet

account.title: Account
account.noTransactions: You don’t have any transaction yet.

exchangeInit.ordersNull: You don`t have any orders yet.

exchange.title: Exchange
exchange.description: This is the easiest way to buy or sell your cryptocurrency, you just have to select the crypto, its amount and the card that will be responsible for sending or receiving the UAH. Total amount you need to pay will contain some fee for using product, it will be calculated automatically. Please, note that the service is provided by means of integration with third-party partner services.

exchange.error_order: An error occurred while execution. The order was processed manually.

sell.error_order: An error occurred while execution. The order was processed manually.

buy.error_order: An error occurred while execution. The order was processed manually.

mainData.maxAmountBuy: The maximum amount of purchase from one card is %{maxAmountToBuy} %{fiatSymbol} per day in parts of %{maxAmountToBuyPart} %{fiatSymbol}
mainData.maxAmountSell: Maximum amount of sale per card %{maxAmountToBuy} %{fiatSymbol} per day
mainData.blockedCard:
This card can`t be used.
Please, select another one

card.title: Add new card
card.description: To add new card, please, scan it or enter number manually
card.instructions: Hold card here. It will scan automatically.
card.attention: Please, be attentive and try to avoid errors.
card.cardName: Set a name to the card

qrScanner.line1: Please, place the QR-code inside the

send.title: Send %{currency}
send.description: Paste the recipient's wallet address or scan the QR-code.
send.descriptionExchange: The recipient's wallet address is set automatically. This is the address of the exchange provider. Assets exchange and payout will be executed after a successful transaction
send.notEnough: You don't have enough funds for send.
send.notEnoughForFee: To send tokens you need to have positive balance in native coin %{symbol}

time.eth_speed_delegated: The transaction will be sent at the expense of a third party. Commission is charged in %{symbol} according to ERC865

errors.UI_CONFIRM_DOUBLE_SEND: Transaction to this address has been already sent few moments ago, are you sure to repeat?
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_FEE: Not enough balance in native coin %{symbol} to send
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_CONFIRMED_FEE: Not enough confirmed balance in native coin %{symbol} to send - please, wait for other transactions to be mined
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOTHING_LEFT_FOR_DELEGAT: Nothing left to pay for delegated fee - please, use usual ERC20 transfer
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOTHING_LEFT_FOR_FEE: Nothing left to pay for fee - please, use Send All button
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_RESPONSE: Server not accepting transaction - please, wait for other transactions to be mined
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_CONNECTED: Server not connected - please, wait a little bit
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_AMOUNT_FOR_AN: Transaction amount too small for any fee
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_WAIT_FOR_CONFIRM: Please, wait for other transactions to be mined or turn on usage of unconfirmed transactions
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_TOO_BIG_FEE_FOR_TRANSACT: Transaction fee too big - please, select less fee manually or enter bigger amount to transfer
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_SELF_TX_FORBIDDEN: Transaction to the same address are forbidden
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_BALANCE_XRP: Not enough balance - 20 XRP should be left on account balance
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_BALANCE_DEST_: Not enough amount - send 20 XRP or more to the destination address as it has no transactions yet
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_TAG_NEEDED_XRP: Not valid destination tag - please, enter destination tag for correct transaction
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_LEGACY_BALANCE_NEEDED_US: Not enough balance on USDT bitcoin address - please, transfer some satoshis to this address
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_RESPONSE_UAX_USE_ETH: Server not accepting transaction - please, wait for other transactions to be mined or use usual ERC20 transfer

walletBackup.title: Backup recovery phrase
walletBackup.description:
Anyone with your recovery phrase can access or spend your coins. Please, carefully write down these %{mnemonicLength} %{words}.
Do not tell the seed phrase under any circumstances!
walletBackup.attention: You will confirm this phrase on the next step

secondStep.description: Let`s verify your recovery phrase. Please, tap each word in the correct order. To delete word from field tap on it again.

mnemonicFail.title: Oh no...
mnemonicFail.description: You have done a mistake in recovery phrase. Please, try again.

skipElement.title: Are you really sure?
skipElement.description: Backup phrase is very important. You will not have access to your founds. Do you want to skip this step?

walletCreate.walletExist: The wallet has been already imported.
walletCreate.name: wallet name

enterMnemonic.description: Insert the entire recovery phrase or enter all words manually (usually 12 or 24 words)

congratsModal.title: Congratulations!
congratsModal.description: Trustee has generated you a new wallet. Backup the recovery phrase later in the settings menu - “Skip” button. Or now, it will take a few minutes - "Copy" button.

input.qrSuccess: The wallet has been successfully scanned!

pleaseWaitModal.title: Please, wait...
pleaseWaitModal.description: Card checking will take some time

waitModal.description: You have already tried to execute an order. Please, wait

featureExpectedModal.title: Feature expected
featureExpectedModal.description: Technology allows transactions that have 0 confirmations to be updated. This feature will allow you to modify published transactions that are in the process of being verified by miners. Can be updated both the transaction fee size and address of recepient. More details following the link.

enterCashBackTokenLink.title: Connect with Comrade!
enterCashBackTokenLink.description: Please, enter the anonymous invitation link of the friend, who invited you to connect your anonymous wallet to his structure. Note that the operation cannot be undone or changed.

success.description: Congratulations, your wallet successfully connected to your friend's structure. Wallets are linked using anonymous identifiers.

cashBackLinkEqualModal.description: Sorry, it is not allowed to specify your own invitation link!

sorryYourDeviceDoesntSupportModal.description: Sorry your phone doesn't support this feature

openSettingsModal.title: Camera permission is required

XRP.title: Please, pay attention!
XRP.description: Your Ripple wallet is not activated. Activation requires to stake 20 XRP. According to Ripple protocol, this amount cannot be unlocked and will remain frozen in your account.

TOKEN.title: Please, pay attention!
TOKEN.description: Token %{currencySymbol} works on %{parentBlockchain} blockchain and for usage you had to have positive %{parentCurrency} balance to pay for miners fee. So far, there is zero balance in your wallet %{parentCurrency}

tokenNotAdded.description: Asset not added. Go to the add asset page?

tokenHidden.description: Asset is hidden. Go to the asset control page?
